name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.232.4
- Added card colors! This has forced the cards in the compendium to separate into 3 different pools - find YGO cards now in the tabs 'The Duelist', 'Duelist_traps', and 'Duelist_spells'.
- Added 2 new cards: Golden Apples, Sphere Kuriboh
- Added Challenge Mode: changes the random pools of buffs and orbs, your starting max summons is 4, the Millennium Puzzle special effects are turned off and instead you start battle with 2 Exploding Tokens, and various other challenge increases
- Added 2 new starting decks: Increment Deck, Exodia Deck
- Summoner orb now summons Spellcaster Tokens when Challenge Mode is turned off
- Translations updates for keywords
- Added translations for all character text in game
- Fixed Chinese-only orbCard problem, orb deck wasn't letting you choose anything but Lightning
- Tidied up the summon list coloring function, tokens should be more clearly colored now


Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
credits:
Thanks to Gremious for his amazing work with both the Default Mod base, as well as the Archetype API. 
Big shoutout to Playmaker for various art contributions:
notably his character button, selection screen art, and the new Yugi character model!
